mapper.select: select a.id,a.batch_id,a.plan_id,a.dispatch_time,a.edit_user_id,a.edit_datetime,a.delete_state,b.price,srm.road_name,srm.road_no, bm.batch,sfm.fl_name,wwm.pitch_weight,usr.u_name from product_dispatch a LEFT JOIN plan_production_collection b ON a.plan_id=b.plan_id LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm on b.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN batch_mgt bm on a.batch_id=bm.id AND bm.delete_state=1 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm on bm.pitch_type=sfm.fl_id AND sfm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN wh_waste_mgn wwm on a.batch_id=wwm.batch_id AND wwm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 where a.delete_state=1
mapper.update: update product_dispatch set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
